title: Sebi bars Brick Eagle for violations
description: It has also taken action against Catalyst Trustee, on whom it imposed a one-year ban on the grounds that it overlooked compliance violations by the fund manager. The ban is only applicable to trustee services provided to funds by Catalyst and not to its mainstay debenture trustee business.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
